name: ACF Widont
author: Oliver

sections.description: To use simply install, navigate to the ACF Widont settings page and enable what fields you would like to have the filter applied to.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the ACF Widont settings page and enable what fields you would like to have the filter applied to.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the ACF Widont settings page and enable what fields you would like to have the filter applied to.

short_description: ACF Widont is a simple plugin to remove widows from ACF fields when they are rendered.
description: To use simply install, navigate to the ACF Widont settings page and enable what fields you would like to have the filter applied to.
